display_long_description:
Wizard’s Legacy blends VR immersion with roguelite replayability, offering action, adventure, and fantasy. Play as a powerful wizard, explore dynamic dungeons, face formidable foes, and uncover ancient secrets. Become the wizard you were meant to be.

[media]
A desperate father, bound by a dark pact, transforms into a wizard trapped within a cursed labyrinth. Each victory grants power, but death returns him to the start. Explore the labyrinth's ever-changing depths, where every battle unveils its grim history. Can you master magic, overcome enemies, and save your child?

[media]

[media]
Dive deeper, shaping the world with every decision. Explore branching paths, unearth secrets, and face escalating challenges. Collect potions and power-ups scattered throughout to enhance your magic and forge your destiny as a powerful wizard.

[media]
Unleash your inner wizard! Draw symbols to control fireballs, ice walls, and lightning. Feel the power surge as you master arcane combat.

[media]

[media]
Choose from a variety of playable characters, each with unique spells and abilities. Experiment with different playstyles – fiery mage, cunning illusionist, or something else entirely?

[media]
The labyrinth teems with cunning foes, each demanding a unique strategy. Test your skills against a diverse array of enemies, adapting tactics to exploit weaknesses and emerge victorious.

[media]

[media]
Immerse yourself in stunning visuals. Explore dynamic dungeons, lush forests, and ominous landscapes, each meticulously detailed for an unforgettable VR experience.


[media]
